about_the_game:
VoxStory: Where Your RPG Dreams Come to Life!

Ever wanted to star in your own epic fantasy series? VoxStory makes it happen! Craft entire worlds, direct awesome trailers of your adventures, and game with your buddies like you're the heroes in a blockbuster movie. Ready to level up your game nights?

Key Features

  • 🎲 The Ultimate RPG Toolbox: Everything you need in one go—no extra stuff for your party to buy!

  • 🌍 Endless World Building: Create and customize massive worlds tile by tile, with seamlessly connecting biomes

  • 🏔️ Diverse Landscapes: Choose from a variety of biomes like forests, deserts, snowy peaks, and volcanic lands

  • 🗺️ Infinite Exploration: Watch your world map grow as you add new tiles

  • 🏰 Super-Smart Building Tools: Whip up cool structures in the blink of an eye

  • 🎥 Be Your Own Director: Create slick pre-game trailers without breaking a sweat

  • 🎭 Game Master Superpowers: Shape your story on the fly like a boss

  • 📱 Couch Co-op: Connect with our free mobile apps for a shared-screen adventure

Gameplay

  • World Crafting 101: Generate new map tiles by choosing size, biome type, terrain features, and even wildlife

  • Seamless Expansion: Add new tiles that connect correctly with your existing world—watch that river flow!

  • Mod Squad: Tweak, change, or completely overhaul your world anytime—you're the boss!

  • Classic RPG Goodness: All the stuff you love—moving, rolling dice, battling baddies, and hamming it up in character

  • Dice Your Way: Roll real dice or let the computer do it for you

  • Crazy Challenges: Game Masters can cook up custom rolls for those "what if" moments

  • Bring the Whole Party: Game with up to 20 pals at once

  • Ready to Roll: Kick off your quest with a full ruleset and starter map right out of the gate

Setting the scene

  • 🎨 Voxel Vibes: Cute, blocky graphics that'll spark your imagination

  • 🌄 Your World, Your Way: Tweak the surroundings to match your epic tale

  • 🎵 Soundtrack Master: Bring your own tunes and sound effects to set the scene

  • ⏱️ Weather Wizard: Change the time of day or cook up a storm whenever you feel like it

Tech Stuff

  • 💻 Potato PC Friendly: Runs smooth even on your trusty old laptop

  • 📺 Big Screen Beauty: Perfect for gaming on your TV with the gang

  • 📱 Play in person: Free player apps for Android and iOS for local play

  • 🔄 Always Fresh: We're constantly adding new goodies to play with

  • 🌐 Easy Online Play: Quick-start codes to get your remote game going in no time

VoxStory isn't just a game—it's your ticket to non-stop adventures. Whether you're a veteran Game Master or just dipping your toes into RPGs, VoxStory's got all the tools to bring your craziest ideas to life.

So, are you ready to write, build, and live out your own epic saga? Dive into VoxStory today and turn your ordinary game nights into legendary quests!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20 or equivalent
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2GHz+ or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: A WiFi Connection to play local matches or a broadband connection to play remotely.

name: VoxStory - Fantasy RPG

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10
  • Processor: 64Bit CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 1060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: A WiFi Connection to play local matches or a broadband connection to play remotely.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10
  • Processor: 64Bit CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 1070
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: A WiFi Connection to play local matches or a broadband connection to play remotely.

short_description: Roleplaying. Reimagined. Ready to build custom worlds and craft your own story? VoxStory is the new fantasy, customisable, rule flexible RPG.
